title: Wall Facing, ca. 1725
dimensions: Overall: H: 146.1 x W: 166.4 cm (57 1/2 in. x 5 ft. 5 1/2 in.)
description: Horizontal rectangular panel of multiple tiles; slight marbelized framework at top and sides, rounded at corners.  Period harbor scene in dark purple (manganese) on white ground, showing anchored and tied-up craft in background, camel and human figures in foreground, trees, right and left, portion of a gateway at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Wall Facing, ca. 1725.
ca. 1725. Tin-glazed earthenware, underglaze. Gift of William Randolph Hearst. 1926-43-1-41.
